page.title: 03Housing- Severn Valley/Wyre
page.content: Much of the housing in the area is expensive commuter housing, the value being enhanced by the rural surroundings and close proximity to the West Midlands towns. There are still some farm houses and farm workers' accommodation, but there is a trend towards older properties being converted into luxury accommodation, making it difficult for young couples to buy homes near their families. The exception is the Meadow Rise development in the SW corner of the area where there is a range of moderately-priced housing and rented Council property. Sample prices are: 5-bedroomed luxury house in Trimpley with 2 bathrooms and 1 acre of land: Â£125,000 3-bedroomed house in Meadow Rise with central heating and small garden: detached Â£29,000;semi-detached Â£26,000
